verses.arabic: بِّسۡمِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلرَّحۡمَـٰنِ ٱلرَّحِیمِ إِنَّاۤ أَنزَلۡنَـٰهُ فِی لَیۡلَةِ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ
verses.translation: Indeed, We sent the Qur'an down during the Night of Decree.
And what can make you know what is the Night of Decree?
verses.transliteration: Wa maa adraaka ma lailatul qadr

verses.arabic: لَیۡلَةُ ٱلۡقَدۡرِ خَیۡرࣱ مِّنۡ أَلۡفِ شَهۡرࣲ
verses.translation: The Night of Decree is better than a thousand months.
verses.transliteration: Lailatul qadri khairum min alfee shahr

verses.arabic: تَنَزَّلُ ٱلۡمَلَـٰۤىِٕكَةُ وَٱلرُّوحُ فِیهَا بِإِذۡنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمۡرࣲ
verses.translation: The angels and the Spirit descend therein by permission of their Lord for every matter.
verses.transliteration: Tanaz zalul malaa-ikatu war roohu feeha bi izni-rab bihim min kulli amr

verses.translation: Peace it is until the emergence of dawn.
verses.transliteration: Salaamun hiya hattaa mat la'il fajr
